description: Number of strong starters in cyclic group of order 2n+1.
references: CRC Handbook of Combinatorial Designs, 1996, p. 469.
W. L. Kocay et al., On strong starters in cyclic groups, Discrete Math., 56 (1985), 45-60.
links: V. Linja-aho, P. R. J. Ostergard, Classification of starters, J. Combin. Math. Combin. Comput. 75 (2010), 153-159
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: Corrected and extended by Vesa Linja-aho (vesa.linja-aho(AT)tkk.fi), May 06 2009
